query.default: select JobTitle, Department, DocumentName, SignedResult from Sungero_Reports_EmployeeSignedDocumentReportV2 where ReportSessionId = @ReportSessionId

query.mssql: create table {0} ([ReportSessionId] [varchar](256) NULL, [JobTitle] [varchar](max) NOT NULL, [Department] [varchar](max) NOT NULL, [DocumentName] [varchar](max) NOT NULL, [SignedResult] [bit] NOT NULL)
query.postgres: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS {0} ([ReportSessionId] varchar(256) NULL, [JobTitle] citext NOT NULL, [Department] citext NOT NULL, [DocumentName] citext NOT NULL, [SignedResult] boolean NOT NULL)

query.default: insert into Sungero_Reports_EmployeeSignedDocumentReportV2(ReportSessionId, JobTitle, Department, DocumentName, SignedResult) values (@ReportSessionId, @JobTitle, @Department, @DocumentName, @SignedResult)
